SQL: Insert into DSD_Job_Log (jobid,Cust,Job,TargetComputer,CreateDate,ScheduleDate,ScheduleTime) SELECT jobid,e.cust,e.job,e.TargetComputer,FORMAT(SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Pacific Standard Time','yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')as CreateDate , CAST(@DateValue as DATE) ,e.ScheduleTime from DSD_Job_Executables AS e WHERE SUBSTRING([ExecuteWeekDays], @DayOfWeekInt , 1) = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DSD_Job_Log AS l WHERE l.jobid = e.jobid  and l.scheduletime = e.ScheduleTime and l.scheduledate = @DateValue  AND l.job = e.Job AND l.TargetComputer = e.TargetComputer)
